Class Egg

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item

game.items.Egg
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllosaurEgg, BrachiosaurEgg, StegosaurAndPterodactylEgg
public abstract class Egg
extends PortableItem
Abstract class which extends the class PortableItem
Version:
2.0.0
Author:
Kamal Varma Joosery
See Also:
This class will be the parent class of all eggs objects produced by the different types of dinosaurs

    • generateGender

      public java.lang.String generateGender()
      This method is used to generate the gender of the dinosaur when the egg hatches randomly There's a 50-50 chance for dinosaur to be female/male
      Returns:
      it returns a string which indicates if dinosaur is 'Male' or 'Female'
